question: What is the name of the traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan?
asked_question_translated: Quel est le nom du jardin traditionnel de la ville de Kanazawa, au Japon, connu comme l'un des trois grands jardins du Japon ?
answer: Le jardin traditionnel de la ville de Kanazawa, connu comme l'un des trois grands jardins du Japon, s'appelle Kenroku-en.
answer_translated_eng: The traditional garden in the town of Kanazawa, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan, is called Kenroku-en.
